-   **Cost:** 40 XP per feat
-   **Starting Feats:** Every character receives 2 free feats at creation
-   **Tier Limits:** Can purchase up to 2 feats per tier (starting feats don't count)
-   **Total by Tier 8:** 2 starting + 16 purchased = 18 feats maximum
